meanings.definition: In a direction or manner towards oneself.
meanings.sent1: She looked selfward in the mirror to fix her hair.
meanings.sent2: He turned selfward to focus on his inner thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched selfward lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The compass needle pointed selfward, guiding the lost hiker home.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches bent selfward under the weight of the snow.
